DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety effectiveness two dose strength study drug compare placebo pediatric patient cystic fibrosis ( CF ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Pediatric Patients With Cystic Fibrosis Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: Have confirm diagnosis CF Have FEV1 great equal 60 % Have oxygen saturation great equal 90 % room air Be clinically stable least 4 week prior screen Be able reproducibly perform spirometry maneuver Have clinically significant comorbidities Have change physiotherapy technique schedule within 7 day prior screen Using prior concurrent medication accord protocol
